short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Page action button that deletes cookies, local storage, browsing history and download history for the website you’re visiting.
short.de: Seitenaktionsschaltfläche zum Löschen von Cookies, lokalem Speicher, Browserverlauf und Download-Verlauf für die Website, die Sie…
short.es: Botón de acción de página que elimina las cookies, el almacenamiento local, el historial de navegación y el historial de descargas…
short.fr: Bouton d'action de la page qui supprime les cookies, le stockage local, l'historique de navigation et l'historique de…
short.it: Pulsante che elimina cookies, local storage, cronologia di navigazione e cronologia dei download del sito web corrente.
short.ko: 현재 방문 중인 웹 사이트의 쿠키, 로컬 저장소, 방문 기록 및 다운로드 기록을 삭제하는 페이지 작업 버튼입니다.
short.nl: Pagina-actieknop die cookies, lokale opslag, navigatiegeschiedenis and downloadgeschiedenis verwijdert voor de website die je…

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Shortcut: Ctrl+Shift+X on Windows and Linux, Cmd+Shift+X on macOS.

This extension respects your privacy. All permissions are used only to remove data for the current website. No data is logged to, or shared with external websites.

Please report issues at https://github.com/blaise-io/forget-about-this-site/issues or send a mail to blaisekal@gmail.com.
long.de,es,fr,ko,nl:
Shortcut: Ctrl+Shift+X on Windows and Linux, Cmd+Shift+X on macOS.

This addon respects your privacy. All permissions are used only to remove data for the current website. No data is logged to, or shared with external websites.

Please report issues at https://github.com/blaise-io/forget-about-this-site/issues or email blaisekal@gmail.com.
